review: The information about this product is misleading. Somehow, I had the notion that as a Prime member I had access to over 40,000 titles at no additional cost. That is not true. Prime members DO get SOME titles for free - but nothing close to 40,000... Not even 1,000.... In fact, I doubt that there are an even 100 titles that are free. The games on this thing are lame (board games like Life but not Monopoly... Card games like solitaire.... That you have to PAY to play??) It was a deeply disappointing Christmas gift.

review: This item is the worst.  It takes multiple tries to set up. Downloads new content for hours, and makes you start over from beginning every time! What a joke! No one is happy with this gift.  Interface is slow.  My cable box is better and easier to set up.Unplug and try again??? That's your solution?? You idiots.I bought this for several people, and it was the worst gift by far on Christmas morning.  You suck Amazon.  I am cancelling my Prime Membership, I am so pissed off at you!
